name: Deeper (MrBundles)
description:
This is my submission to the Godot Wild Jam #45  (Theme: Underground)

A simple platformer in which you will explore some scenic caves.

Note: If you make it to the last level with the house, make sure you go into the house and go up to the window. This will trigger the end sequence and add your score to the leaderboard.

- Controls -

Move with WASD or arrow keys

- Use of Theme -

The game takes place underground in a series of caves.

*SPEEDRUN MODE*

Speedrun mode is unlocked when you complete all the levels.

A timer appears when playing a level and the sum of your best scores is submitted to the leaderboard.

- Known Issues -

Rev 0.2.1

-Interactions with red tiles can be inconsistent.

-Audio can crackle at times.
